channel.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
channel.description:
if you've read the news, apperently bin laden's been saying some shit. ;o
What do you think? Are we gonna fight the nuclear(sp?) war or not?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

wayzey:

Ontopic: If USA just randomly nuked where they thought Osama was it’d be incredibly moronic and well it would start a huge war where it’s pretty much USA vs Every other country. USA would just get raped though they’d do some pretty mighty damage to China, Russia and Europe seeing as they’re the strongest countries/continents so USA would aim to take out them before they can launcher their nukes.

The theoretical war you mention here would mean the destruction of America, even if they win the war. Other country’s won’t like America anymore, and then it’s bye bye trade.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:6, topic:282129”][quote author=united0wnage link=topic=372780.msg2813088#msg2813088 date=1244120356]
if you’ve read the news, apperently bin laden’s been saying some shit. ;o

What do you think? Are we gonna fight the nuclear(sp?) war or not?
[/quote]
How would you bomb a location of a moving/unknown target?[/quote]

XD That’s going in my siggy.

Ontopic: If USA just randomly nuked where they thought Osama was it’d be incredibly moronic and well it would start a huge war where it’s pretty much USA vs Every other country. USA would just get raped though they’d do some pretty mighty damage to China, Russia and Europe seeing as they’re the strongest countries/continents so USA would aim to take out them before they can launcher their nukes. That is of course ignoring the fact that Osama is as big a threat to USA as the common housefly, capturing him is just so the US army doesn’t look foolish and just for pride.

There was no initial war against Osama, the invasion in Iraq isn’t and wasn’t a war it was well an invasion. Calling it a war is like calling Galipoli a successful invasion, it simply isn’t.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I know for sure that many Soviet nukes don’t work, and I doubt the majority ever did. The same probably applies the the US. Nukes are propaganda weapons. I’ve said it a million times, and will say it a million times again. If a country is able to say “WE HAZ NUKEZ!” the population of their enemy’s are scared and poop their pants.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:16, topic:282129”]cooper: If US attack first they would lose.
Russia have more nuclear weapons but not know much about the quality.
Hope there never would be a new world war.[/quote]
Oh, that makes sense. America’s nuclear weapons are probably just as old as Russia’s, but I don’t know for certain.
Hopefully not, but chances are there will be another war… there is just too much conflict for there not to be.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:7, topic:282129”][quote author=goatee link=topic=372780.msg2813497#msg2813497 date=1244140611]
In a nuclear war between us and Bin Laden I think we might just squeeze a win, considering Bin Laden has no nukes.
[/quote]
You would maybe win against Osama, but rest of the world would take actions against US.[/quote]
The only reason for that is the radiation/blast radius of the bombs.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior

This thread is retarded. OP didn’t even give his opinion. I think Osama Bin Laden, is really me in my basement, making video.

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

DEATH TO AMERICA
on topic
China, Russia and the former Soviet bloc nations… I think they could defeat America, I don’t know about America + allies though, as I don’t know much about their armies.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

item.title: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:13, topic:282129”][quote author=goatee link=topic=372780.msg2813608#msg2813608 date=1244145630]

In a nuclear war between us and Bin Laden I think we might just squeeze a win, considering Bin Laden has no nukes.

You would maybe win against Osama, but rest of the world would take actions against US.

I’m speaking from the UK, I was thinking more of the west against Bin Laden. And I highly doubt anyone is going to go against the US anytime soon. Only the Russians and China.

Yes and rest of Europa follow if necessary.

UK wouldn’t go against the US. They are like our little brother (whose grown larger than us).

Maybe Germany and other big European countries.

Germany go against the USA? I don’t think anyone in the EU other than former soviet union countries will even consider it to be perfectly honest. We are stronger together, and the EU is against terrorism aswell.
[/quote]
But if US goes to far in what they use in the war they can be stopped.
Don’t help fighting terrorism if you become a bigger terrorist than who you fight.[/quote]
Too late unfortunately, but the propaganda keeps us happy.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think we're going to have another battle aganst osama bin laden again?

I’m speaking from the UK, I was thinking more of the west against Bin Laden. And I highly doubt anyone is going to go against the US anytime soon. Only the Russians and China.

Yes and rest of Europa follow if necessary.

UK wouldn’t go against the US. They are like our little brother (whose grown larger than us).

Maybe Germany and other big European countries.
[/quote]
Germany go against the USA? I don’t think anyone in the EU other than former soviet union countries will even consider it to be perfectly honest. We are stronger together, and the EU is against terrorism aswell.[/quote]
But if US goes to far in what they use in the war they can be stopped.
Don’t help fighting terrorism if you become a bigger terrorist than who you fight.
